name: 陳燦輝
objective:
１. 組合分析
２. 機率理論
３. 隨機變數
４. 隨機變數函數
５. 機率分佈
６. 期望值性質
７. 樣本分佈
８. 假設檢定
９. 線性迴歸分析
１０. 變異數分析
schedule:
1. Introduction 
2. Combinatorial Analysis 
3. Binomial and Multinomial Theorem 
4. Axioms of Probability, Sample Spaces
5. Probability As a Continuous Set Function and Measure of Belief
6 .Conditional Probability and Bayes' Formula
7. Independent Events
8. Random Variables
9. Mid-term Exam
10. Expected Value , and Variance
11. Continuous Random Variable
12. Continuous Distribution (1)
13. Continuous Distribution (2)
13. Joint Distribution Functions
14. Conditional Distributions 
15. Random Sample, Sample Variance
16. Sample Standard Deviation
17. Point Estimate, Interval Estimate, and Statistics Inference
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Grading:
   20% Attendance and Quizzes
   20% Assignments
   30% Mid-term Exam
   30% Final Exam
